name: Escapeland Will Be Neverland
description:
ESCAPE FROM THE NEVERLAND !

FULL OF MONSTERS AND COLLECT ALL THE GEMS.THERE WERE ALSO APPLES IN THIS GAME AS YOUR REWARD OF THE EASTER EGG.GO FIND THE APPLES ! TO UNLOCK THE ACHIEVEMENT. SOMETHING DIFFERENCE MIGHT BE SOMETHING SPECIAL.THANK YOU FOR PLAYING MY 2D PLATFORMER GAME.

Instruction:

1) D,A to move

2) Space to Jump

3) Left Click to Attack

4) If you spot something difference,Press S.

5) Enjoy
